visual_description.scene: test tube on light illuminated surface, top view through open end
visual_description.view: close-up of test tube bottom from above

plasma.color: light yellow with darker zone in center
plasma.notes: dark amorphous formation visible at center of bottom -- presumably clot or sediment; plasma is lighter and more transparent at edges; marking visible on test tube wall at upper right

visual_description.scene: test tube on light illuminated surface, top view through open end
visual_description.view: close-up of test tube bottom from above

plasma.color: light yellow with olive tinge in central part
plasma.notes: loose dark mass visible at center of bottom -- clot/sediment occupying significant part of bottom; test tube edges are white (plastic); plasma around clot is more transparent

visual_description.scene: test tube on light illuminated surface, top view through open end
visual_description.view: close-up of test tube bottom from above

plasma.notes: plasma appears more homogeneous compared to other samples; bottom is clean, without pronounced clots; thin linear structures barely visible at bottom; overall appearance significantly more transparent than previous samples

visual_description.scene: three test tubes lying horizontally on LED panel (white backlighting), side view
visual_description.view: general side view, three test tubes parallel

plasma.notes: light rounded clots/sediment visible at bottom (rounded part) of all three test tubes; upper test tube (21.4.1) -- sediment less pronounced; middle (0.4.1) and lower (19.4.1) -- sediment more noticeable and larger; marking visible on middle test tube; lower test tube also has marking; air bubbles visible on walls of middle and lower test tubes
